body:
A few answers.

1) Calling an equivalent C library also crashes.  That points away from a GO problem.

2) I was incorrect about the Racket access. It's quite fine.  That points away from a GO problem.

3) I've only used GO for 2 weeks.  That points to the user. 

It turns out that installing Python from the python.org site is clashing somewhere with Apple OS installed python libraries.  Rather than actually trying to fix it, I'm just going to reinstall all the OS from scratch and accept Apple's outdated Python version.

Thanks for the response and consider this not a GO problem.
